title: 140 20th Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: In decline, large cavity in base of tree so extensive that you can see through the tree's root flare, also being overtaken by neighboring tree; can be replaced, but on south end of property

title: 3641 California Street
Reason(s) for removal: Removal permit for construction (787838); significant tree that falls within the foortprint of a new mixed use building (housing and commercial space); in-lieu fee will be paid due to loss of permanent planting space and one new tree will be planted at the curb

title: 1868 Greenwich Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (787727); significant tree within footprint of planned new building construction and cannot be preserved, species does not tolerate root pruning and excavation; property owner to pay in-lieu fee for loss of permanent site

title: 1240 Lombard Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (787860); tree has outgrown space and is damaging property and foundation; replacement not suitable and therefore not required

title: 1351 42nd Ave
Reason(s) for removal: Associated with permit 785244. Reasons for removal: All trees in poor condition. BUF will allow developer to remove and replace trees in poor health. Site is being developed into the "Francis Scott Key Annex Educator Housing", https://sfmohcd.org/francis-scott-key-annex. BUF denied 14 trees proposed for removal.

title: 52 Ashbury Street
Reason(s) for removal: One viable trunk (stem) remaining after several large branch failures in the past two years, amount of damaged tissue existing at similar points around remaining trunk/stem has significantly weakened structural integrity of tree, there are several wounds in the same area around the stem reducing its load bearing capacity, multiple unsealed wounds indicate low vigor, pruning remaining foliage unlikely to mitigate risk and will further stress the tree; will be replaced

title: 900X Van Ness Avenue (in median)
Reason(s) for removal: Removal permit for construction of Van Ness BRT project (787880); median to be reduced for BRT project, trees will be destabilized by root cutting, excavation will occur with 2.5' from trunk on both sides of trees, bus pad cannot be reduced; will be replaced with Corymbia Citriodora

title: 1453 McAllister Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (787796); significant canopy decline, much smaller and less vigorous than neighboring tree of same species and age; property owner to remove and replace
